evidence.claim: HomeCare Advocacy Network utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure.
The organization is focused on HIPAA compliance for health data handling.
HomeCare Advocacy Network integrates with HL7 FHIR protocols for health information exchange.
Twilio API is used for communication in health services provided by HomeCare Advocacy Network.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction use cases or clearinghouse operations found.
